Package io.github.cailyn_baksh.cmlc

Class CMLCompiler

java.lang.Object
io.github.cailyn_baksh.cmlc.CMLCompiler
public class CMLCompiler extends Object
Parses CML files and generates the corresponding C code.

  • Constructor Details

    • CMLCompiler

      public CMLCompiler(String srcFile, String outDir, String baseFileName) throws org.dom4j.DocumentException, IOException, CMLCompiler.CMLParseException
      Instantiate a new compiler
      Parameters:
      srcFile - Path to the source file
      outDir - Path to place output files in
      baseFileName - The base name of the output file
      Throws:
      org.dom4j.DocumentException - If there is an error parsing the CML file into the DOM
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the file
      CMLCompiler.CMLParseException - If there is an error in the syntax of the CML file

  • Method Details

    • loadXMLDocument

      private org.dom4j.Document loadXMLDocument(File file) throws IOException, CMLCompiler.CMLParseException, org.dom4j.DocumentException
      Validates a file against the CML schema and loads it into the DOM
      Parameters:
      file - The file to load
      Returns:
      A Document object representing the file. Can return null if the file at CML_SCHEMA is malformed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurred while reading the file
      CMLCompiler.CMLParseException - If there is an error in the syntax of the CML file
      org.dom4j.DocumentException - If there is an error parsing the CML file into the DOM

    • loadWidgets

      private void loadWidgets(org.dom4j.Document doc)
      Load widgets from a document. This document should have already been validated against CML_SCHEMA.
      Parameters:
      doc - The document to load widgets from.

    • generateC

      public void generateC() throws FileNotFoundException, CMLCompiler.CMLParseException
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
      CMLCompiler.CMLParseException

    • funcName

      private String funcName(String winName)
      Generate the corresponding function name for a window
      Parameters:
      winName - The name of the window
      Returns:
      The name of the window function

    • generateGlobals

      private void generateGlobals(CodeWriter inc, CodeWriter src)
      Generate the C code declaring globals. The generated code expects to be outside a method definition.
      Parameters:
      inc - CodeWriter for the header file
      src - CodeWriter for the source file

    • declarePrototypes

      private void declarePrototypes(CodeWriter inc, CodeWriter src)
      Generate the necessary function prototypes in the header and source files.
      Parameters:
      inc - CodeWriter for the header file
      src - CodeWriter for the source file

    • generateMenu

      private String generateMenu(org.dom4j.Node rootNode, CodeWriter src)
      Generate a menu
      Parameters:
      rootNode - The root menu node
      src - The source file's CodeWriter
      Returns:
      The name of the menu's variable
